lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur's title hopes suffered a setback on Saturday after they dropped points at Liverpool but manager Mauricio Pochettino was comforted by the knowledge that his young team will keep improving in the seasons to come.

headline.print_headline: Pochettino Predicts Bright Future for Young Spurs
headline.main: Pochettino Predicts Bright Future for Young Spurs

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur's title hopes suffered a setback on Saturday after they dropped points at Liverpool but manager Mauricio Pochettino was comforted by the knowledge that his young team will keep improving in the seasons to come....
